summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 37th Avenue from a point fifth (50) feet north the north line of East Spring Street to the north line of Rosedale Addition in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 12912, creating Local Improvement District No. 1145 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
